name: FOSSIL FISH HUNTER
description:
Info

Destroy all fish in the level to move on to the next.

Types of enemies.

Balloon Fish balloon fish either dont move, move in a line or move randomly.

Spike Fish Dont attack when it shows it spikes or you die.

Ghost Fish if you hit it while its fading then you dont kill it.

Mine Fish if you hit it you die.

Controls

A & D to rotate.

Hold Left Mouse to charge attack and let go off it to attack.

Press P to show the pause menu.
